original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND c.UserId = ph.UserId AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=487 AND u.UpVotes<=27 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-10-22 22:40:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 17:01:31' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 487 AND users.UpVotes <= 27 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-10-22 22:40:35' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 17:01:31')
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.Id=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2.Id)
